Question: During their absence this person's first book, Three Stories and Ten Poems, was published.
Hints: In the late spring this person and Pauline traveled to Kansas City, where their son Patrick was born on June 28, 1928.
Some critics have characterized this person's work as misogynistic and homophobic.
Almost exactly 35 years after this person's death, on July 1, 1996, Margaux **** committed suicide in Santa Monica, California.
